course_description: An historical/theoretical survey of the experimental avantgarde as an alternative to mainstream narrative, with an emphasis on its wide variety of forms. May include a filmmaking component. Weekly screenings required.
prerequisites: FILM 301 or FILM 301W or FILM 302 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
